course_title: Special Topics: East Asian Studies: The Stories of Chinese Objects
class_notes: (Same as CHN 375 2)  This class contains synchronous and asynchronous material. It will meet synchronously at the listed day and time, with all other content to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: Study of East Asian literature, history, society, thought, or culture, alone or in conjunction with other literary or cultural trends. Topics to be announced in advance.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4714, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-7:15p, Instructor: G. Chen, Status: Closed
